Header: Sri Lanka has proven its ‘democracy’ credentials: Senior Indian journalist Rao
Content: Padma Rao Sundarji, a senior Indian journalist specialising in foreign affairs and war reporting, says Sri Lanka has proven its credentials of democracy. The book titled “Sri Lanka The New Country” penned by Padma Rao Sundarji was launched in Colombo on Friday, July 3. A group, including the Indian High Commissioner to Sri Lanka Y.K. Singha, and Minister of Foreign Affairs Mangala Samaraweera were present for the launch.
